title: Shopaholic Black Friday
description: Shopaholic Black Friday is a beauty game where you play as the stunning Lena on a thrilling shopping spree. Dive into a world of makeup choices, from vibrant lipsticks to sultry eyeshadows. Race against time at the mall, filling your bags with trendy dresses, stylish shoes, and dazzling accessories. Unleash your creativity, experiment with makeup, and create the perfect look for Lena. Get ready for a shopping adventure like never before!
